{"step_by_step_thinking": "The working time of an impression material is the time from start of mixing till just before the start of appearing elastic properties. This can be inferred from the review of modern impression materials which mentions that the new addition type silicone impression materials proved superior to the other materials tested, but all materials were capable of giving good clinical results. This implies that the working time refers to the period during which the material is still in its liquid or pliable state before it starts to set and gain elasticity.", "answer_choice": C}
